item.title: Micro Frotendends
item.description: This is an interesting talk from Michael Geers on Micro Frontends. He gave the talk at Web Rebells 2018. Michael Geers: Micro Frontends - Think Smaller, Avoid the Monolith, ❤️ the Backend | Web Rebels 2018
